query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `course_modules` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `courseId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(200) NOT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `sortOrder` int DEFAULT 0,
  `totalLessons` int DEFAULT 0,
  `totalDurationMinutes` int DEFAULT 0,
  `isPreview` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `course_modules_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `course_modules_courseId_courses_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`courseId`) REFERENCES `courses`(`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION
);
